name: RollerCoaster Tycoon 2
description:
This script will install "RollerCoaster Tycoon 2" GOG edition with support for modern computer configuration.
During install please let all options by default.
This script uses OpenRCT2 project: https://github.com/OpenRCT2/OpenRCT2.
Big thanks to people who gave their time to permit us playing this game in the best conditions.
notes:
- OpenRCT2 version 0.2.4
- I wrote this installer in case using native Linux port of OpenRCT2 would not work on your distribution.
- Please report issue concerning this script on my Github page:
https://github.com/legluondunet/MyLittleLutrisScripts/

script.custom-name: RollerCoaster Tycoon 2 - GOG - OpenRCT2 win64 bits

files.rct2setup: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG

content:
custom-name: RollerCoaster Tycoon 2 - GOG - OpenRCT2 win64 bits
files:
- orct2win: https://github.com/OpenRCT2/OpenRCT2/releases/download/v0.2.4/OpenRCT2-0.2.4-windows-portable-x64.zip
- rct2setup: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG
- inno: http://constexpr.org/innoextract/files/snapshots/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
game:
  args: --user-data-path=config
  exe: drive_c/OpenRCT2/openrct2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Preparing wineprefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    src: inno
- execute:
    args: -d "$CACHE" "$rct2setup"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/RCT2
    src: $CACHE/app
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/OpenRCT2/
    src: orct2win
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: csmt
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\Direct3D\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_DWORD
    value: '00000000'
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: background
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Control Panel\Colors\
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    type: REG_SZ
    value: 0 0 0
- write_config:
    data:
      general:
        drawing_engine: OPENGL
        fullscreen_height: $RESOLUTION_HEIGHT
        fullscreen_mode: 1
        fullscreen_width: $RESOLUTION_WIDTH
        game_path: C:\\RCT2
        window_height: $RESOLUTION_HEIGHT
        window_width: $RESOLUTION_WIDTH
    file: $CACHE/config.ini
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/OpenRCT2/config
    src: $CACHE/config.ini
- execute:
    command: cd $GAMEDIR/drive_c/RCT2/ ; rm -f -r __support/ gog* webcache.zip RCT2.EXE
wine:
  Desktop: true
